msContents.summary: A manuscript containing the Ṛgbhāṣyaṭīkā, Jayatīrtha's commentary on the Ṛgbhāṣya, Ānandatīrtha's commentary on the first 40 sūktas of the Ṛgveda.

msItem.title: Ṛgbhāṣyaṭīka
msItem.author: Jayatīrtha
msItem.incipit:
nārāyaṇābhidhaṃ jyotiḥ pratyūhadhvāṃtaśāṃtikṛt | kamalākalānaṃdam aṃtasvāṃtam upāsmahe | ṛcāṃ padā
ny upādāya teṣāṃ bhāṣyapadais saha | kurmas saṃvāditāmātraṃ yathādhītaṃ yathāmati | iha khalu saṃsārākūpārapāraṃ jigamiṣatā
m arthanīyyasya bhagavatprasādasya tadjñānam aṃtareṇāsaṃbhavāt tadarthaṃ pravṛttā api vedā apratipattivipratipattipa
ttibhyāṃ natatkāraṇatām aśnuvate |
msItem.explicit:
yuddham iti pradhanaparyāyo hi mahāghanaśa
bdaḥ | garbhaśabdo lpavācī | kṣatriyāṇāṃ prasiddhadhanaṃ yuddhāpekṣayā lpadhanam eveti | her arthaḥ | yad vā anena mārgeṇottarasyāpi maṃtrajā tasya vyākhyānaṃ pra siddham eva | ata uparabhyata iti hiśabdenācaṣṭe |
bhagavanmuniḥ || = || ❈ || devatāḥ kaṃcukāyaṃte devevaṃdi janāyate | yasya tasmin ramānāthe suhṛḍā prītir astu me | ye bhavaṃti janāḥ saṃtaḥ prajñā saujanyaśālinaḥ | toṣaṃ te
matkṛtau yāṃti kim anyaiḥ paśusaṃnibhaiḥ | śabdānāṃ sādhanaṃ samyak tatprayojanakīrtanaṃ | nākārṣaṃ vistarabhayādi hatatkṣamyatāṃ budhaiḥ || = ||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrīmad ānaṃdatīrthabhagavatpādācāryavi
racitasya śrīmadṛgbhāṣyasya ṭīkā śrīmajjayatīrthapūjyacaraṇaviracitā samāptā || = || ❈ || śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇam astu || ❈ || śrī || śrī || śrī || śrī ||

extent.measure: 213 numbered folios, 2 guard folios at the beginning of the bundle, and 1 at the end, one flyleaf between ff. 49 and 50, and one bookmark between ff. 116 and 117.

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, 1 to 213v.

additions.desc: On the top left side of the recto of the first flyleaf, running over three lines, there is an indication about the text title, number of folios and extent: varadavāni 213 vijivāni 28 ṛgbhāṣyaṭīkajayatīrthāyyasamagragraṃtha 1.
